welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haramachida, the charming city known for its rich history and traditional culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a valid military ID is required to access it.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.
